com.joliciel.talismane.terminology

Interface TerminologyBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostGresTerminologyBase

    public interface TerminologyBase
    A collection of "terms" extracted from a given corpus.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
